stages.logText: On a farm I heard of Guynmart Castle nearby. The farmer Rhodita worried about young Lady Hannah of Guynmart who used to come often for visit, but had not been seen for a week now. Rhodita asked me to look after her.
I got to the castle, but the main gate was kept shut.
I got to the castle, but the main gate was kept shut.
I found the way into the castle garden.
The guard at the back door is corrupt. He would let me through for some gold.
He told me who is living at the castle: Gyunmart himself with his children Hannah and Robalyrius.
In the main hall I met Unkorh the steward. He expected Guynmart back the next morning. I should go to the kitchen for some bread and then leave.
I met Lady Hannahs little brother Rob.
The maiden told me that Hannah is missing her precious. I should talk to Hannah, she is on the tower top. To get to her, I should tell the cook that I could bring Hannah her lunch.
I overheard the Steward talking to himself. Guynmart would die in the castle dungeon, and after ursuping the throne Unkorh would marry Lady Hannah.
I suggested to Hofala the cook that I could bring some lunch to Lady Hannah. He had no more special herb selection for the lunch and asked me to get some fresh from Nuik in the garden.
Nuik gave some herbs to me.
I should bring lunch to Lady Hannah on the tower top.
Hannah is filled with grief, she can not think clearly without the smell of a rose. Before she can tell me her whole story, she needs a fresh, fragrant rose.
Unkorh saw me talking to Hannah. He is very jealous and let guard Olav show me the special guest exit.
I met Norgothla, the chief of Guynmarts personal garde. He is troubled about my news from the castle, and asked me to get evidence for it.
I got the rose from the guard at the garden door at last.
I gave the rose to Hannah. She told me that Lovis is vanished. In her dark dreams she hears Lovis voice calling out of deepest depth.
Hannah gave Lovis flute to me. So I might prove that I am sent from Hannah.
I met Rob in a room above the watch chamber. Rob promised to distract the guards so that I could pass by.
120 obsolete - The guards are distracted and would not see anybody climbing downstairs.
130 obsolete - I jumped into the dark dungeon below the tower
I jumped into the dark dungeon below the tower where I found Lovis. He was overjoyed to get back his flute.
The dungeon door flew open. The torturer entered and demanded to stop that noise.
After the torturers death the door was open to you.
Lovis left into the wood to get Guynmarts personal guards.

Half dead in a cell Guynmart layed. He asked me to open the castle gate so that his personal guard may come in. After that I should run away, because there would be a nasty battle. I should return not before next morning.

Unkorh appeared and explained many things. Then Unkorh saw that Guynmart tried to kill me from behind but stumbled and fell into his own knife. I still should open the gate and go to the farm in the south.
Unkorh appeared and drawed Guynmart down. Then he fled cowardly.
The guards let me through to the wall.
I got the main gate open.
I went to Rhodita the farmer and stayed there for the night.
When I got to the castle on the next day, I saw Hannah and Lovis in the throne room. The castle was decorated for a wedding and there had beed a merry feast.
When I got to the castle on the next day, I saw Unkorh the steward in the throne room. The castle was decorated for a wedding and there had been a merry feast.
Hannah gave me an everlasting fragrant rose as a present.
I was allowed to choose something in the treasury.
I took the scroll of wisdom.
Lovis prepared a surprise for me west of the castle.
Then I took leave of Unkorh.
Little Stuephant was crying, because he lost his marbles. You decide to find them for him.
I found a pearl white marble.
That were all. I could give them to Stuephant now.
The old man on the hill top yearned for a meal of bread and cheese together with wine.
I brought him bread, cheese and wine. He is utterly happy.

He would be even happier if the cheese was cheddar from Charwood.
You get the cheddar there if you explicitly ask for it.
I got bread, cheddar and wine for him. He started feasting gladly.
